check.name: check_a_tipo
check.Predicate: (a_tipo)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['c'::character varying, 'r'::character varying, 'u'::character varying, 'd'::character varying, 'rr'::character varying])::text[])

check.name: check_c_fecha_nacional
check.Predicate: (c_fecha_nacional IS NULL) OR ((c_fecha_nacional >= c_fecha_apertura) AND (c_fecha_nacional <= now()))

check.name: check_j_dia
check.Predicate: (j_dia)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['l'::character varying, 'm'::character varying, 'x'::character varying, 'j'::character varying, 'v'::character varying, 's'::character varying, 'd'::character varying])::text[])

check.name: check_s_fecha_pago
check.Predicate: (s_fecha_pago IS NULL) OR ((s_fecha_pago >= s_fecha_pago) AND (s_fecha_pago <= now()))
